instruction: Summarize the text to 50 words. Output should contain only one sentence.
input: Colcord Hotel is an esteemed 19-story, 310 foot tall building standing sentinel in downtown Oklahoma City, as it has since 1911. In its heyday, the Colcord was not just the most fashionable address in the city; it was also the tallest building west of the Mississippi River, the most modern, and the first fireproof building in Oklahoma, a “skyscraper” with the latest in steam elevators and electricity.
output: Colcord Hotel is a 19-story, 310 foot tall building, established in 1911 in downtown Oklahoma City, which boasted various features such as fireproof construction, steam lifts, and electricity when it was first constructed.
